attributes.action: make purpetrators of crime pay with longer sentences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that if you do the crime, ....you must pay with time,life should mean life, longer sentences for rapes, murder, violent crime. zero tolerance on any crime, take away the the cushy treats and privilages, these people do not deserve these in jail, these people took away the rights of the people they committed against to a right to walk down the road with out looking over their shoulder, the right to be comfortable in their own home, for children to play freely, amongst a few things.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
